p.span: Welcome to the Iowa-Grant School District. Our Mission is to work in partnership with the community to empower all students to reach their full potential as responsible individuals who strive for life-long learning to successfully compete in an ever-changing global society.

a.title: Click here to visit the Aesop website

a.title: Click here for Iowa-Grant's COVID-19 Updates

br.a: Click here for Iowa-Grant COVID-19 Updates

a.title: Click here for Iowa-Grant's COVID-19 Updates

div.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: 600; text-transform: uppercase; padding: 5px 10px; font-family: Arial;
box-sizing: border-box; padding: 5px 10px 10px; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-word; font-family: Arial;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Governor Tony Evers announced all school buildings in Wisconsin will remain closed through the end of the 2019-20 school year and the Safer at Home order has been extended until 8 am Tuesday, May 26 (or until a superseding order is issued). This announcement hit a lot of us pretty hard. We may have been expecting it, but nonetheless a wave of sadness hit our staff when they learned of this.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We suspect that the announcement and our situation may cause a flurry of emotions for our students, families, and communities. The pandemic closed our school buildings quickly. We didn't know that our goodbyes on Friday, March 13 were going to be the last time we got to have our current students in our physical classrooms and building. This is hard for everyone, but it is comforting knowing that we are all in this together.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: I have mentioned the 4Rs which I believe are the key to education. Those Rs are: Rigor, Relevance, Relationships, and Resilience. This pandemic has challenged us to continue the amazing work we have done to build relationships and provide a rigorous curriculum which is relevant to our students. Challenge is where resilience comes in. We grow stronger when we overcome life's challenges. Sometimes the challenges are bigger than we can handle alone. At some point in this current challenge of the pandemic, we are all going to need someone to help remind us that we are all in this together and that “this too will pass.” Please know that IGSD has a lot of great people and we are determined to show our resilience and help each other through this. Please know that we are here for you and your children.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: The Iowa-Grant School District is striving to continue to meet the needs of our students and their families as we comply with the “safer at home” order. We will only have essential staff in our buildings until at least May 26th. We will continue to provide our “Panther Pick-up” which consists of two breakfasts and two lunchs which can be picked up at IGEMS on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from 6:30-8:30 am. Please

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: or contact building secretaries to sign up for this program. In addition to our Panther Pick-up, we have funds available through the generosity of community members which can help us to help families in need of additional food. Please contact

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: , if there is something we can do to help your family.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Per our district calendar, the last day of school for students is Tuesday, June 2nd and Friday, May 22 for seniors. We will continue providing virtual and other distance learning opportunities until then. It will be challenging to prepare students for the next grade level when they fully participate in this alternative instruction, but we are going to do our best for your children. Please do all that you can to keep your children engaged. Please reach out to teachers, guidance counselors, and principals if there is anything any of us can do to help.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We understand you have more questions than we have answers right now. Now that we know that students won’t be returning to the buildings physically, we can work these things out in a way that will follow the Safer at Home order and also hopefully find opportunities to celebrate and connect virtually. We will keep you posted as we learn more.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Thank you for your patience, understanding, and flexibility. We will get through this together. Please continue to stay safe, practice social distancing, and remain at home as much as possible. We greatly look forward to the time when it is safe to be with each other again.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
text-align: center; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

strong.span: The state report cards are out ~ IGEMS is a 5 star school!

span.style: text-decoration: underline; width: 40%; height: 20%; font-family: latobold; font-size: 16px;

img.alt: Image of Sign Congratulating IGEMS on Being a 5-Star School
img.title: Image of Sign Congratulating IGEMS on Being a 5-Star School

span.style: text-align: center; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: large; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

span.span: Each Fall, the Office of Educational Accountability (OEA) at the Department of Public Instruction (DPI) issues

a.title: Click to go to the Wisconsin Department of Public Instruction's Report Cards website

span.span: for schools and districts in Wisconsin. The report cards present key information related to outcomes for students as measured by statewide assessments, attendance, staying in school, and high school completion. Whole school performance cannot be captured in any one report, but we are very proud of our students, staff and community for the work that they do each day to help us reach for those 5 stars!

a.title: Click to view the Iowa-Grant District Report Card 2018-19 pdf
Click to view the Iowa-Grant District Report 2018-19 Detailed pdf
